mapper.select: SELECT a.ADMIN_ID, a.EMP_NO, a.AUTHOR_CD, a.ADMIN_LOCKYN, a.USE_YN, a.ADMIN_PASS_UPDT_DT, a.FRST_REGIST_DTM, a.FRST_REGTER_ID, a.LAST_UPDT_DTM, a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, FN_ORGNM(b.DEPT_CD, 'DEPT') DEPT_NM, b.EMP_NM, b.EMP_CLPHN, b.EMP_EMAIL, A.CENTER_CD FROM TSEH_ADMIN_INFO_M a, TSEH_EMP_INFO_M b WHERE a.EMP_NO = b.EMP_NO AND ADMIN_ID = #{adminId}
